title: "Play" button is grayed out and unclickable. There's no message of why.
body: I am unable to play the game (due to the button being grayed out) and there's no explanatory message to tell me why. Help, please!

replies.body: The Play button locking out like that can be caused by a few things like a bad patch installation or permissions problem.  As a first step, go through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that your OS settings are allowing game files to load properly.  Let me know if that helps!
